translation.en: Are you gonna throw up? Do you want me to pull over?
Shouldn't I be over morning sickness by now?

Dad must think I'm an idiot.

Sounds like he's really in trouble.

Non. Je ne vois rien du tout.
- Oui ! Venez vite. - Les urgences, bonjour.

translation.en: - Hi, uh... I'm on Route 400. - Help!
I don't know the town name, but there's a kid lost in the grass.

translation.en: I lost the 911 chick. Is your phone working?

translation.en: Please, keep coming. I can't find you.

translation.en: Becky, where the hell are you?
Something's not right about this. I think we should head back to the road.

translation.en: Let's just get back together first.
I'll keep talking and you work your way back towards me, okay?

Cal, quit fucking around. This isn't funny.

On the count of three, we both jump with our hands raised in the air.

I think you're gonna have a baby this summer, that's what I think.

you didn't show up in San Diego.

That's the way things work around here.

translation.en: Let me guess. Lead singer in a band?
Four- piece, with a weekly gig at the local?

translation.en: I'm a good judge of people. You gotta be, in my field.

translation.en: We were on a little family vacay through the heartland.

translation.en: It was going pretty well till we ran into you.

translation.en: tried to warn you. I'm just giving you a hard time, that's all.

translation.en: I know it's not your fault.

C'est un sale coup du destin.

before, uh, real estate was my game,

translation.en: But, you know, got married and had a kid, and...

once you touch it, you'll know.

translation.en: We're all here because we've got stuff to work out.

translation.fr: Et cette pierre, dans sa sagesse,

translation.en: brought our two families together to do just that.
translation.fr: a réuni nos deux familles pour cette raison.

translation.en: All it's asking for is a little faith.

translation.en: Five little fingers on its face and you will be redeemed!

translation.en: All your sins, all your trespasses, all your regrets will melt away

I think you should let her go.
Look, you don't have the advantage here.
If you think I was doing the soft sell because I was afraid of going the other way,
translation.fr: Si vous croyez que j'ai dit ça juste parce que j'avais peur de vous brusquer,

translation.en: well, you got another think comin'.
It's better that you come to the rock on your own.
translation.fr: C'est mieux si ça vient de vous.

translation.en: Open your heart to it, like I did.
translation.fr: Ouvrez votre cœur comme je l'ai fait.

translation.en: Now, what I really wanna know...
is how did you get here?
Because the rock wouldn't let you find us unless it wanted you to.
translation.fr: Tu nous as trouvés, car la pierre l'a autorisé.
À moins qu'il ne s'agisse pas de toi.

translation.en: - Cal! Cal! - No. Come with-- Cal, help him!

translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un menteur.

translation.en: When you touch that rock, you'll know everything I know.
translation.fr: Quand tu toucheras cette pierre, tu sauras tout ce que je sais.

translation.en: Everything the grass knows, including how to leave.
translation.fr: Tout ce que l'herbe sait, y compris comment partir.
Seulement, tu ne le voudras pas.
- C'est juste de la chair. - Maman !

translation.en: - And all flesh is grass. - No!

translation.fr: Ne vous fatiguez pas, les enfants.
Vous n'échapperez pas à la Rédemption.

translation.en: He's right, you know? Where are we gonna go?
translation.fr: Il a raison. On va aller où ?

translation.en: He'll find us. For sure, he'll find us.
translation.fr: Il va nous trouver. C'est sûr.

translation.en: Listen to me. First thing we have to do is you need to take hold of my hand.
translation.fr: Écoute-moi. Tu vas tenir ma main, d'accord ?
- Tout va bien, Tobin. - Papa a raison.
- Tout va bien, Tobin. - Papa a raison. On est de l'herbe.

translation.en: We keep dying and coming back.
- Are you okay? - I'm fine. I'm fine.
- I didn't know what to do. - Yeah, you sure didn't.
translation.fr: - Je ne savais pas quoi faire. - Ça s'est vu.

translation.en: Well, we wouldn't be in this mess if it wasn't for you.
translation.fr: On est dans ce pétrin à cause de toi.

translation.en: Okay, blaming each other isn't gonna solve anything.
translation.fr: Se rejeter la faute ne résoudra rien.

translation.en: Well, all indicators are that there's no way to solve this.
translation.fr: Tout indique qu'il n'y a aucune solution.

translation.en: If we're just gonna go round and round in circles,
translation.fr: Si on doit rester coincés ici,

translation.en: I'll feel a lot better saying what we all know.
translation.fr: on ferait mieux de dire les choses.

translation.en: Are you forgetting the detail that he completely abandoned you?
That he totally threw you away?
That he wanted you to abort your own baby?
- I just wanted... - You just wanted to what?
I need food. I need water. I need a place to sleep.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin de nourriture, d'eau, d'un endroit pour dormir.

translation.en: What I don't need is any more brotherly love.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas besoin de ton amour fraternel.

translation.en: But that's not the real reason you don't like me.
translation.fr: Mais ce n'est pas pour ça que tu ne m'aimes pas.

translation.en: No, it's a good excuse, but it's not the reason.
translation.fr: Non, c'est une excuse, ce n'est pas la raison.

translation.en: You didn't want me around even before there was a baby.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'aimais pas, même avant le bébé.

translation.en: The truth is, there's nothing that I could have done to make you like me,
translation.fr: En vérité, quoique je fasse n'aurait été suffisant pour toi,

translation.en: because no one is ever gonna be good enough for your little sister.
translation.fr: car personne ne sera jamais assez bien pour ta sœur.

translation.en: - A high school diploma would be nice. - You know what?
I'm not quite the fuckup that you think I am!
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas le raté que tu penses !

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no. You're a real rock star.
translation.fr: Oh, non. Tu es une vraie rock star.

translation.en: You've sacrificed everything for that ridiculous, infantile fantasy,
translation.fr: Tu as tout sacrifié pour un rêve ridicule et enfantin,

translation.en: and now we're all suffering for it.
translation.fr: et on en paye tous le prix.

translation.en: And you're a real hero. Playing hubby to your little sister?
translation.fr: Et toi, t'es un vrai héros. Tu joues au mari ?

translation.en: That's the next best thing to fucking her, which is what you really want, isn't it?
translation.fr: C'est aussi bien que de la baiser, et c'est ce que tu veux, hein ?
La Rédemption est à votre porte !

translation.en: He's not gonna get through that without a sledgehammer.
translation.fr: Il lui faudrait un marteau pour entrer.

translation.en: I wouldn't be so sure about that.
translation.fr: Je n'en suis pas si sûr.

translation.en: What are we gonna do? We're stuck up here!
No, listen to me. When I drove here, I saw this building from the road.
translation.fr: Écoutez. En arrivant ici, j'ai vu un bâtiment.

translation.en: Yeah. The church, it was just on the other side.
translation.fr: L'église. C'était juste de l'autre côté.

translation.en: Only thing is, we go in that grass again and we're back to square one.
translation.fr: Mais si on va dans l'herbe, on retourne à la case départ.

translation.en: Fucking dog gives me the creeps.
translation.fr: Il me donne la chair de poule.

translation.en: The way out? You think that's it?
translation.fr: Une sortie ? Tu crois que c'est ça ?

translation.en: Maybe. But we're not there yet--
translation.fr: Peut-être. Mais on n'y est pas...

translation.en: Becky, we've gotta get out of here.
Holes are everywhere, Calvin, my boy.
translation.fr: Il y a des trous partout, mon vieux.

translation.en: - Travis! - Beck, we have to keep moving!
We can't just leave! I'll come back for him, but we have to get you out!
translation.fr: - On va pas le laisser. - Je reviendrai. Tu dois sortir.

translation.en: I found a way. It's... It's right there.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé une issue. C'est juste là.

translation.en: Beck, I'm your brother, and I'm telling you right now to forget about that asshole.
translation.fr: Beck, je suis ton frère, et je te dis d'oublier cet enfoiré.

translation.en: Thought that you would lose your sister when you got out of here.
translation.fr: Tu pensais que t'allais perdre ta sœur, en sortant.

translation.en: That the baby would bring her and Travis together, you'd be left out in the cold.
translation.fr: Qu'elle allait se rapprocher de Travis et t'abandonner.

translation.en: You're probably right on that score.
Your mistake is thinking you're ever leaving.
Of course, I was a bit of a track star back in the day.
translation.fr: J'étais plutôt bon en course, avant.

translation.en: - - I know. I know. I know.
You're thinking if you had just turned left instead of right,
translation.fr: Tu penses que si tu avais tourné à gauche plutôt qu'à droite,

translation.en: you could've gotten away from me.

translation.fr: et tu as tourné à droite.

translation.en: And you kept running and didn't turn at all.
translation.fr: Et tu as couru sans tourner.

translation.en: in the garden of forking paths,
translation.fr: dans le jardin aux sentiers qui bifurquent,

translation.en: you didn't make any one choice.
translation.fr: tu n'as pas fait un choix.

translation.en: And they all led back to me.
translation.fr: Et ils mènent tous à moi.

translation.en: I think he loves you a little too much.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'il t'aime un peu trop.

translation.en: I had my chance with you, and I threw it away.
translation.fr: J'ai eu ma chance, et je l'ai gâchée.

translation.en: I want you to know I...
I'm glad you didn't listen to me.
translation.fr: t'as eu raison de pas m'écouter.

translation.en: There's something I didn't tell you.
translation.fr: quelque chose que je ne t'ai pas dit.

translation.en: I was gonna give her up.
I didn't think I was ready to be a mom.
translation.fr: Je pensais ne pas être prête.

translation.en: That's why we were, um, going to San Diego.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'on allait à San Diego.
Ce n'est plus ce que tu veux ?

translation.en: What difference does it make now?
We're gonna get out of here.
I'm gonna find a way. Our baby deserves to live.
translation.fr: Je trouverai un moyen. Notre bébé mérite de vivre.

translation.en: I wish I could just touch your hand.
translation.fr: J'aimerais pouvoir te tenir la main.

translation.en: How funny. This is where I tussled with Natalie for the first time.
translation.fr: C'est drôle, c'est là où j'ai affronté Natalie pour la première fois.

translation.en: I tried to show her the way, but she just wouldn't listen.
translation.fr: Elle refusait de suivre la voie que j'indiquais.

translation.en: You wanna touch the rock, darlin'?
translation.fr: Tu veux toucher la pierre, chérie ?

translation.en: You wanna lay on it naked?

translation.fr: Tu veux me sentir en toi ?

translation.en: Beneath the pinwheel stars while the grass sings our names?
translation.fr: Sous les étoiles tourbillonnantes, pendant que l'herbe chante nos noms ?

translation.en: but tears are better for an old, thirsty rock like that.
translation.fr: mais les larmes sont mieux pour cette vieille pierre assoiffée.

translation.en: - It has to be quick, though. -
translation.fr: Il faut que ce soit rapide.

translation.en: Don't wanna do it in front of the kid.
translation.fr: Faudrait pas que le petit nous voie.
Ne laisse pas Cal faire du mal à Travis !

translation.en: Or else we're gonna keep making the same mistakes forever.
translation.fr: Sinon, on continuera à faire les mêmes erreurs.

translation.en: - No, not too fast. - I don't want you to get sick.
translation.fr: Pas trop vite. Je ne veux pas que tu tombes malade.

translation.en: - May I have a look? My baby? - It's okay.
translation.fr: - Je veux la voir. - C'est bon.

translation.en: - I've got her. I've got her. - Baby...
Out of the oven and baked just right.
translation.fr: Tout droit sortie du tiroir. Elle est parfaite.

translation.en: Wonder when the Wise Men will come.
translation.fr: Je me demande quand les Rois mages vont arriver.

translation.en: I wonder what gifts they'll have for us.
There once was a farmer from Leeds
translation.fr: Autrefois à Leeds se trouvait un fermier,

translation.en: Who swallowed a bag full of seeds
translation.fr: qui avait avalé plein de fumier.

translation.en: - grew all shaggy with weeds - Mm.

translation.fr: - Ce que je mange. - De l'herbe.

translation.en: Cows do it all the time.

translation.fr: Mon père a tué le bébé.

translation.en: He's gonna keep killing us over...
translation.fr: Il va continuer à nous tuer encore...

translation.en: I'm not gonna let him hurt you.
translation.fr: Je ne le laisserai pas te faire du mal.

translation.en: But he's watching us right now.
translation.fr: Il nous observe en ce moment.

translation.en: Your honey took my eye out.
translation.fr: Ta chérie m'a pris un œil.

translation.en: Too bad, kid. I liked ya.
Saw a seed of myself in there.
translation.fr: J'ai vu un peu de moi en toi.

translation.en: was to help you find redemption.
God knows you're the one who needed it the most.
translation.fr: Dieu sait que tu en avais besoin.

translation.en: - No! - It wants you to touch it.
translation.fr: - Non ! - Elle veut que tu la touches.

translation.en: - Redemption is so very, very easy. -
translation.fr: La Rédemption est à la portée de tous.

translation.en: Sounds like he's really in trouble.
I've been trying to get to the road, - but I can't find it! -
translation.fr: Je cherche la route, mais je la trouve pas !

translation.en: Stay away from it. Stay away.
Get back in the car. You have to go.
- Kid, where are your parents? - It doesn't matter. Please.
translation.fr: - Où sont tes parents ? - Peu importe.

translation.en: - We just have to go. Get in the car. - Okay.
- I can't find my way out! - What do we do?
translation.fr: - On fait quoi ? - Je suis perdu.

translation.en: I mean, it sure sounds like he's in trouble.
No. No! No, don't let him go in!
translation.fr: Non ! Ne le laissez pas y aller.

translation.en: If he goes in, you'll go in and you'll never get out.
translation.fr: S'il entre, vous le suivrez et vous ne sortirez jamais.

translation.en: - Where did you get this? - Travis.
He said he got this from Travis.
translation.fr: Il dit que Travis le lui a donné.

translation.en: But right now, we have to go. Please.
translation.fr: Mais il faut partir. S'il vous plaît.

translation.en: You've gotta help me get out of here!

translation.fr: Il y a quelque chose qui cloche.
S'il vous plaît ! Ne partez pas !

translation.en: - That's back the way we came. - Yeah, I know.
translation.fr: - C'est de là qu'on vient. - Je sais.

translation.en: I thought we said we were gonna go on.
translation.fr: T'as dit que tu voulais continuer.

translation.en: What about that family in San Diego?
translation.fr: Et la famille de San Diego ?

translation.en: I have my own family now.
♪ By the way she wears her apron ♪ ♪ And the clothes she wore ♪
